name: World of Warships: Legends. Texas Marine
name_original: World of Warships: Legends. Texas Marine
description:
Don't mess with the T! 

Play with the famous battleship Texas and shoot your enemies Texas style!
Also comes with a stack of supplies to maximize her potential for several battles! Boosters, camouflage, and currencies, as well as Premium time are all at your disposal for a great time in-game.

This bundle includes:

• American battleship Texas
• 750 doubloons
• 3 days of Premium account
• 500,000 credits
• 10 common boosters of each type (50 total)
• 10 sets of Type 1 camouflage

NOTE: Certain contents will become available to you upon reaching a specific account level. Doubloons will be given as compensation for duplicate Premium ships.
